scripts.e2e-complete: yarn backend-e2e; docker-compose -f __tests__/e2e/docker-compose.yml up -d && yarn start-e2e-mode & (sleep 20 && yarn e2e)
scripts.e2e-complete-ci: yarn backend-e2e-ci & yarn start-e2e-mode & (sleep 20 && tail /tmp/deliveryengine/logs/error.log && yarn e2e)
scripts.selenium-start: docker rm e2e_chrome_debug; docker run --name e2e_chrome_debug -p 4444:4444 -p 5900:5900 -v /dev/shm:/dev/shm selenium/standalone-chrome-debug
scripts.backend-e2e: export CSS_DEV_URL=https://ads.travelaudience.com/css; export CREATIVE_DEV_URL=https://$(./node_modules/my-local-ip/index.js):8080; export TEMPLATE_DEV_URL=https://ads.travelaudience.com/js/templates ; docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml build; docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml up
scripts.backend-dev: export CSS_DEV_URL=http://ads.travelaudience.com/css; export CREATIVE_DEV_URL=http://$(./node_modules/my-local-ip/index.js):8080; export TEMPLATE_DEV_URL=http://ads.travelaudience.com/js/templates ; docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml build; docker-compose -f ../docker-compose.dev.yml up
scripts.buildallstaging: export NODE_ENV=staging; export BUILD_ALL=true; webpack --config webpack.config.babel.js
